description: Try our easy to follow Easter Egg Hot Chocolate recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot chocolate,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Chocolate treats,No-bake desserts,Quick & easy dessert,High protein,High fibre,Wheat free,Chocolate,Easter
name: Easter Egg Hot Chocolate Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove wrappers from eggs. Use a sharp knife to carefully remove the top of one of the eggs, then sit it in a mug.
Roughly chop the remaining egg and place in a small saucepan with milk, cocoa and vanilla. Stir over low heat for 5 minutes or until melted and combined.
Pour hot chocolate into egg sitting in mug. Top with marshmallows, whipped cream, and chocolate shavings. Serve immediately.
